name: Second Date
description:
Have you ever been nervous before a big date? Like really nervous? So nervous it could kill you?

Marvin doesn't think you have.

He's a young guy, courting the affections of a woman named Jessica. There's something troubling about her though, can't quite place... and yes, beyond the interest she's shown in our buddy Marvin. You'll learn that this guy, man -- he just can't catch a break.

Second Date is a romantic thriller, a text-based puzzle game, where... you escape.

Contains strong language including descriptions of graphic violence.
